cause.description:
Website Description
TeachItWell.com is a free, volunteer based website that contains materials for subjects ranging from Calculus to Chemistry. Developed for teachers by teachers, our comprehensive curricula include in-depth lessons, reviews, and worksheets that include proven strategies as well as insights from actual instructors. In order to foster openness in the teaching community, TeachItWell.com's open sourced interface allows users to interact and continually enhance every one of our shared resources.
Get Involved!
Our dynamic, multidisciplinary team is searching for energetic individuals that want to break down barriers to learning and gain valuable skills and experience in a small venture setting. TeachItWell is still developing and positions are open in the following departments.
WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT CONTENT RESEARCH AND DESIGN CONTENT MEDIATION RECRUITING MARKETING FINANCE
If you are interested, please contact TeachItWell@gmail.com for more information.
1. “Education is too important to be left solely to the educators.” Francis Keppel
2. TeachItWell.com is a truly user-based community that will dictate its own growth and audience.
cause.mission: To provide a resource that enables teachers to become better instructors & offer practical, comprehensive, quality resources for core academics where users improve & share teaching methods.
cause.name: TeachItWell.com
